revised_title: Anatomical Variations in Human Myology: Observations from the Winter Session of 1867-68 at King's College, London
tldr: This study examines 36 human subjects to analyze variations in human myology, focusing on the muscles of the head, neck, arms, and legs. The research identifies numerous instances of muscular abnormalities and discusses their implications for understanding the development and function of the human muscular system.
